Package grabbables

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • grabbables.Grabbable
      • grabbables.Weapon
  • public class Weapon
extends Grabbable
    This class contains all the information needed for a weapon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon()
        Empty constructor, should not be used

      • Weapon

        public Weapon​(java.lang.String name,
              AmmoAmount buyCost,
              AmmoAmount reloadCost,
              java.util.Collection<ActionTemplate> actions,
              java.lang.String description)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        name - name of the weapon
        buyCost - Cost that must be paid to pick up the weapon
        reloadCost - Cost that must be paid to reload the weapon
        actions - A collection that contains all the actions that can be performed with the weapon
        description - a description of the weapon

      • canReload

        public java.util.Optional<AmmoAmountUncapped> canReload​(AmmoAmountUncapped ammoAvailable)
        This method checks if this weapon can be reloaded, given the amount of ammo currently available
        Parameters:
        ammoAvailable - The amount of ammo currently available
        Returns:
        An empty Optional if the weapon can't be reloaded, otherwise the amount of ammo left

        Returns:
